U

update() - Method in interface main.Observer
Require an update method that takes a step when the updateObservers method is called by the Subject.
update() - Method in class main.Player
Call update on the player's turtle, and update list of lines controlled by that player if the turtle moved.
update() - Method in class main.Turtle
Update the turtle's location by either taking a step within the current MOVE command, or by going to the next command and updating the orientation/steps left to take.
updateOrientation(double) - Method in class main.Location
Add turn degrees to the orientation.
updatePlayers() - Method in class main.PlayerList
Update all the Player objects, taking a step and updating Turtle and Lines controlled by the player
updateStage(Stage, Pane, String) - Method in class main.ViewApplication
Given a Scene Graph, a Stage, and a title, update the stage with the given title and set the output to the scene graph.
